00037 #include "egs_rectangle.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 #include "egs_functions.h"
00040 
00041 EGS_RectangularRing::EGS_RectangularRing(EGS_Float xmin, EGS_Float xmax,
00042         EGS_Float ymin, EGS_Float ymax, EGS_Float xmin_i, EGS_Float xmax_i,
00043         EGS_Float ymin_i, EGS_Float ymax_i, const string &Name,
00044         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_SurfaceShape(Name,f), valid(true) {
00045     EGS_Float tmp;
00046     if( xmin > xmax ) { tmp = xmax; xmax = xmin; xmin = tmp; }
00047     if( ymin > ymax ) { tmp = ymax; ymax = ymin; ymin = tmp; }
00048     if( xmin_i > xmax_i ) { tmp = xmax_i; xmax_i = xmin_i; xmin_i = tmp; }
00049     if( ymin_i > ymax_i ) { tmp = ymax_i; ymax_i = ymin_i; ymin_i = tmp; }
00050     if( xmin_i < xmin || ymin_i < ymin || xmax_i > xmax || ymax_i > ymax ) {
00051         valid = false; return;
00052     }
00053     r[0] = new EGS_RectangleShape(xmin,xmin_i,ymin,ymax);
00054     r[1] = new EGS_RectangleShape(xmax_i,xmax,ymin,ymax);
00055     r[2] = new EGS_RectangleShape(xmin_i,xmax_i,ymin,ymin_i);
00056     r[3] = new EGS_RectangleShape(xmin_i,xmax_i,ymax_i,ymax);
00057     p[0] = (xmin_i - xmin)*(ymax - ymin);
00058     p[1] = (xmax - xmax_i)*(ymax - ymin);
00059     p[2] = (xmax_i - xmin_i)*(ymin_i - ymin);
00060     p[3] = (xmax_i - xmin_i)*(ymax - ymax_i);
00061     A = p[0] + p[1] + p[2] + p[3];
00062     p[0] /= A; p[1] = p[1]/A + p[0]; p[2] = p[2]/A + p[1];
00063     p[3] = 1.1;
00064 
00065     otype = "rectangular ring";
00066 
00067 }
00068 
00069 EGS_RectangularRing::~EGS_RectangularRing() {
00070     if( valid ) { delete r[0]; delete r[1]; delete r[2]; delete r[3]; };
00071 }
00072 
00073 
00074 extern "C" {
00075 
00076 EGS_RECTANGLE_EXPORT EGS_BaseShape* createShape(EGS_Input *input,
00077         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00078     if( !input ) {
00079         egsWarning("createShape(rectangle): null input?\n"); return 0;
00080     }
00081     vector<EGS_Float> pos;
00082     int err = input->getInput("rectangle",pos);
00083     if( err ) {
00084         egsWarning("createShape(rectangle): no 'rectangle' input\n"); return 0;
00085     }
00086     if( pos.size() != 4 ) {
00087         egsWarning("createShape(rectangle): found only %d inputs instead"
00088                 " of 4\n"); return 0;
00089     }
00090     EGS_BaseShape *shape;
00091     vector<EGS_Float> posi;
00092     err = input->getInput("inner rectangle",posi);
00093     if( !err && posi.size() == 4 ) {
00094         EGS_RectangularRing *s = new EGS_RectangularRing(pos[0],pos[2],pos[1],
00095                 pos[3],posi[0],posi[2],posi[1],posi[3],"",f);
00096         if( !s->isValid() ) {
00097             egsWarning("createShape(rectangle): your input did not result in"
00098                 " a valid \"rectangular ring\"\n");
00099             delete s;
00100         } else shape = s;
00101     }
00102     else shape = new EGS_RectangleShape(pos[0],pos[2],pos[1],pos[3],"",f);
00103     if( shape ) { shape->setName(input); shape->setTransformation(input); }
00104     return shape;
00105 }
00106 
00107 }
